name: Resend OTP
description: Request a new OTP code if the previous one expired or was not received

body.name: email
body.description: The email address to resend OTP to

response.description: Returns success message with new OTP sent

status_codes.429: Too many requests - please wait before requesting new OTP

notes: Can only resend if the previous OTP has expired
If OTP is still valid, you must wait for it to expire before requesting a new one
New OTP is valid for 10 minutes
Previous OTP record is deleted when requesting a new one
